de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.benchmark

Class ValidateApproximativeKNNIndex<O,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,D,Result>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.benchmark.ValidateApproximativeKNNIndex<O,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,D>, Parameterizable

    public class ValidateApproximativeKNNIndex<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,D,Result>
    Algorithm to validate the quality of an approximative kNN index, by performing a number of queries and comparing them to the results obtained by exact indexing (e.g. linear scanning).
